replies.replyComment: mata whatsapp eke add kara group ekak tharuna set ekak. e yakku Naga ge nama vikunala sticker banner walata salli ekathu karanawa. Tsunami vinaseta podi ayata denna pitarata aya ewapu sellam baduth horakam karapu sakkiliyo thamai lankawe inne. e nisa hondama wade gota hari kamak na pitarata hitapu srilankan kenek janathipathi unoth hondai. Gota neethi dala thiyanawa vimal weerawansata kata wahaganna kiyala baila gahanne nathuwa. e wage hondai

@Amaya Nugawela wade thiyenne lankawe mahajanaya kiyanneth maithripala la  namal la sajithla ma thamai. 75% inne kupadiyo. meka thamai hethuwa Rohan wage successful eth minissunge waradi walata anukampa karana kenek ona. nathnam Naga kiyanawa wage 225 vitharak newei srilankan la 75% vithara hirayata yawanna wenawa awrudu 2k vitthara. ekata  mahinda china ekka hadapu airport eka hondai. ithuru 25%. rata hadai. mekai mage yojanawa

@Amaya Nugawela mehemai. Mamath kiyanne na horek kiyala. mekata hethuwa Lankawe sanskruthiyak eka. Balanna oya unath anduwe thanakata giyoth pagawak denne nadda? File ussanne nadda? Oyath boru ne halo. Ekai Lankawe aththa thathwaya. Ekinekata angilla dik karanne nathuwa nayakathwayata enna ona hari dakmak thiyana kenek. UNP eke horu mama personally dannawa. Eth eyalageth hondak ganna puluwan. Ravi karunanayaka wage kattiya Ranil unath hadaganna puluwan. Amma kenek wage nayakayek ona kanata gahala hadanna. Rohan e wage kenek. Eyage ehema waraddak na vitharak newei harima sarthaka buddimath adaraneeya charithayak, Basil wage durwalayek newei Rohan
